known_issues: UI inconsistency on small screens: "Begin Meditation" button appears too thin in height compared to "Save as Ritual" when the guide container buttons stack into a single column.

existing_features.title: Update the selected “More Details” button in the Pre‑Meditation page’s Meditation Guide container (selected element XPath: /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1]/div[1]/div[1]/div[2]/div[1]/div[3]/div[1]/button[1]) so it renders at the bottom of the guide container instead of in the guide header area, without changing its label or navigation behavior (it must still navigate to /knowledge with the current meditation type and scrollToContent search param).

Update the selected “Begin Meditation” button (selected element XPath: /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1]/div[1]/div[1]/div[2]/div[2]/button[1]) so that on lower-width screens—when the action buttons area collapses from a 2-column/side-by-side layout into a single-column stack—its visual height increases to better match the “Save as Ritual” button. This change must only affect the small-screen stacked layout and must not change the button’s width or behavior.

new_feature_requests.summary: Move the selected "More Details" button (links to knowledge page) to the bottom of the guide container.
Increase the "Begin Meditation" button height on lower-width screens when the guide container buttons collapse from 2 columns into a single column, to match visual weight vs "Save as Ritual".

projectName: Adjust Pre‑Meditation guide buttons: move “More Details” to bottom and increase “Begin Meditation” height on small screens
